description.narrative: By 2016, the large urban centers municipalities enrolled in the UNICEF Urban Center Platform committed to reducing child rights and gender and racial related inequities and ensuring CRC compliance to contribute with the improvement of their social indicators for children and adolescents thus addressing inequities in Brazil .

Development of multi-sectoral legislation/policies/strategies/action plans supporting development and participation of adolescents
ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, the large urban centers municipalities enrolled in the UNICEF Urban Center Platform committed to reducing child rights and gender and racial related inequities and ensuring CRC compliance to contribute with the improvement of their social indicators for children and adolescents thus addressing inequities in Brazil .

description.narrative: The Platform for Urban Centers achieved its goal by contributing to the reduction of intra-urban inequalities of the eight participating municipalities. Most significant progress achieved was regarding the improvement on access to prenatal care. Over 16,000 adolescents were mobilized and capacitated. Over 8,000 community members engaged in Territorial Fora. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: By 2016, municipalities in large urban centers with its indicators improved and interurban inequities reduced

target.value: 2016:60% of enrolled municipalities (5) in the Urban Centers Platform initiative with their interurban inequities reduced

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED 100% of enrolled municipalities had intra-urban inequalities reduced in at least 1 indicator.

title.narrative: By 2012, youth-led community maps on environmental risks developed and divulgated

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2015, social mobilization activities carried out by the municipalities enrolled in the initiative.

target.value: 2015:At least one activity of social mobilization carried out in each municipality which signed the Partnership Agreement by end of 2015

actual.value: 2016:Target achieved UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2014, a baseline assessment of indicators of intraurban inequities completed by the municipalities enrolled in the initiative.

target.value: 2014:5 municipalities (around 60% of total invited) completed a baseline assessment of all indicators of intraurban inequities, as defined in the cooperation agreement with UNICEF

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2012, participatory diagnostic with plan of action on vulnerability to violence and lack of basic services elaborated

target.value: 2016:05 diagnoses with plan of action on vulnerability to violence and lack of basic services elaborated in 05 popular communities

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2013, municipalities in large urban centers participating in the initiative of the Platform for Urban Centers (Belm, Fortaleza, Macei, Manaus, Salvador, So Lus, So Paulo, Rio de Janeiro)

target.value: 2013:6 municipalities (around 80%) invited to participate in the Urban Centers Plataform are enrolled in the initiative

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2012, number municipality in large urban centers with its indicators improved and interurban inequities reduced

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2012, popular communities of large urban centers with the prioritized goals achieved

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.

title.narrative: By 2013, a methodology for disparities' reduction, including inequalities related to race/ethnicity, gender and place of living, is developed.

actual.value: 2016:TARGET ACHIEVED UNICEF will keep monitoring the results met.
